definition: physically or spiritually homeless or deprived of security, poor people who unfortunately do not have a home to live in
details:
adjective
- physically or spiritually homeless or deprived of security
= synonyms: dispossessed
- without nationality or citizenship
= synonyms: stateless
noun
- poor people who unfortunately do not have a home to live in
= example: poor people who unfortunately do not have a home to live in
- someone unfortunate without housing
= example: someone unfortunate without housing
= synonyms: homeless person
